summary:
I am a digital native, with a passion for digital marketing, fashion, technology and sustainability with a Master degree in Communication Studies. I have more than 5 years of experience in e-commerce, digital marketing and branding. Throughout my career, I have worked cross-functionally within various companies as well as with external partners (i.e. agencies and accounts) while managing the budgets and the project timelines.

I am a communicative, fast learner in any kind of situation, always working with focus and enthusiasm. I do believe that a high level of attention to details within tight deadlines is highly important in order to deliver the best results. In addition, I adapt easily to new situations and I like to meet new people.

In my spare time, I love doing social activities, watching movies, reading, cooking, traveling abroad, and doing sports such as aerobics and weight lifting.

My specialties are in the areas of E-commerce, User Centered Design, Research, Digital Marketing, Advertising, Communication, Branding, Social Media, ICT, CRM, Project Management, Fashion, Sustainability, Food, and Visual Art

awards.title: DELTA Scholarship, The Netherlands
awards.description: A scholarship granted from The Netherlands for selected students in chosen developing countries from September 2002 until September 2004

publications.name: Here’s my location, for your information: The impact of trust, benefits, and social influence on location sharing application use among Indonesian university students

courses.name: Essentials in New Media and Communication
ICT in Organization: Developed an adoption plan, an implementation plan, and a monitoring plan of an Enterprise Social Software (ESS) for University of Twente (UT)
Multi-Channel Management: Developed a proposal for Municipality of Amsterdam on how they should manage various communication channels to communicate with their citizens

New Media Design (Increasing Online Trust through Privacy Policy and Usability): Developed a suggestion report regarding the design of the privacy policy section and usability of an e-commerce website.
Pre-Master Thesis: Senior Citizens' Perceptions Towards E-Commerce: Understanding User Acceptance Towards E-Commerce of Seniors Citizens in The Netherlands
Public Communication: Developed a campaign plan using multi-channel management strategies to increase citizens’ awareness on the risks of drunk - driving in Indonesia.
Research Topics in New Media and Communication: Assessing Content Creation Skills and Social Capital of Indonesian Citizens: Comparison Study Between Visually Impaired and Non-Visually Impaired
Self-Regulatory and Consumer Psychology: Getting a Grip on Drinking Behavior: Training Working Memory to Reduce Alcohol Abuse
Users Centered Design: User Experience research on visually impaired and children with autism users regarding the use of self-service websites

profile_positions.description:
Zalando : 
- Brand lead for Jordan Brand (OCT 2017 - Jan 2021)
- Brand lead for Nike Kids (OCT 2018 - present)
- Brand lead for Nike Sportswear (OCT 2019 - Jan 2021)

KICKZ : Brand lead for Nike Basketball and Jordan Brand (OCT 2017- OCT 2019)

Key Responsibilities:
-Develop and drive strategic brand initiatives in collaboration with the key accounts.
-Brief, plan and deliver Nike brand campaigns at accounts' channels.
-Responsible for ensuring a seamless transition from campaign planning to campaign execution in collaboration with the key accounts and agencies.
-Collaborate across the business to bring the vision to life (i.e. Integrated Retail Marketing (IRM), category, territories, functional teams (i.e. Media/Comms partners, Influencer Marketing, Sports Marketing), as well as commercial teams (Sales, Planning, and Operations).
-Develop and execute Nike ambassadors program together with the key account. This includes selecting right profiles to represent Nike, creating content strategy as well as building and nurturing relationships with them.
-Responsible for owning campaign budget and managing its allocation (i.e. from creative production to media spend).
-Drive performance marketing and integrated media strategy for Nike at Zalando. This includes working on integrated cross-channel media plans across channels (I.e On-site placements, Social ad, Display ad) as well as creating segmentation and personalization strategies to increase campaign effectiveness.
-Drive the agenda of test and learn with the aim to improve consumer journey and future campaign performance.
-Lead Lifestyle events and Basketball events with up to 300 attendees in Berlin in collaboration with the account and territory teams.
- Responsible for Nike retail executions at KICKZ key doors in Berlin and Hamburg.
profile_positions.title: Brand Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities
-Owned planning of annual and seasonal nike.com cross-category landing pages to ensure creative content were relevant for CEE markets in line with cultural and demographic complexity (i.e. different timing on gifting moments for Middle East market).
-Supported territories' commercial moments. This includes initiating and leading the first Ramadhan campaign in the Middle East and Turkey, from performing market research, content production, strategic development, execution up to evaluation.
-Coordinated cross-functional alignment between the global cross-category team, territories, digital merchandising, digital brand design and categories, to ensure that the campaigns were aligned with their strategies and guidelines.
-Partnered with external media agency to plan, execute, test and evaluate cross-category campaign ads through social channels (e.g. Social, Programmatic and Display ad).
-Drove cross-category campaign reporting and demonstrated business results to accelerate future campaigns using data mining tools such as Omniture and Tableau.
-Worked closely with Digital Merchandising team to evaluate customers' journeys in nike.com, and to remove any friction on their journey.
-Worked with external agency to develop a tool (shop-able widget) to enable a shorter customer journey from external channels, such as affiliate/influencer blog, to the nike.com check-out page.
profile_positions.title: Digital Brand Specialist - Nike.com (Central & Eastern Europe)

profile_positions.description:
- Led nike.com cross category commercial campaigns (i.e. Gifting, Summer essentials).
The Netherlands
- Worked closely with the performance marketing team to ensure that the campaigns were visible across digital marketing channels such as with SEO, SEA, affiliates, email marketing, and online media teams.
- Owned seasonal calendar for Homepage and Mens’ Landing page and analyzed the data behind these pages and created strategy on how to optimize the clickthrough rates.
- Partnered up with territories and categories to plan and support their local or GEO stories and ensuring that the quality is up to global design standard.
- Seasonal and daily communication with global, territory, digital commerce and category stakeholders to plan and activated relevant stories for cross-category nike.com platforms.
- Quarterly Digital Event Planning: organised 2 days hind-sighting event to review the performance of Nike.com business and activations from prior season.
profile_positions.title: Digital Brand Specialist - Commerce (Western Europe)

profile_positions.description:
- Managed and monitored the incident tickets backlog of the digital department in Nike Western Europe (WE) through Jira and created strategies on how to improve the process of solving the incidents. In addition, I was responsible for providing training materials and support to Jira users within the digital department.
- Responsible for elevating seasonal key looks on the mobile site for all categories. In addition, I also monitored mobile site performance and created a recommendation to improve users' experience on the mobile site.
- Managed the GEO expansion project of store.nike.com. In this project, I supported the UX sessions, tracked and monitored all the issues (i.e. translation and content issues) found during the implementation and reported this regularly to the project owner.
profile_positions.title: Associate Technical Producer Operations Digital Commerce

profile_positions.description: Co-authoring a research on the use of Location Based Social Network (LBSN).
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Summary of responsibilities:
- Worked closely with various advertising agencies and managed various digital marketing campaigns for General Motors, focusing on Western Europe and Middle East markets.
- Responsible for campaign production and execution.
- Worked closely with data specialists to capture consumers' data and to maintain the database.
- Monitored and analyzed the effectiveness of the campaign.
- Developed materials required for various internal and external communications of MMIT International.
- Assisted the employees on the adoption of various e-mail marketing tools.
profile_positions.title: Email Marketing Developer

profile_positions.description:
Summary of responsibilities:
Responsible for customer acquisition, customer relationship management, and identifying opportunities & digital trends to build Myngle brand awareness.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Summary of responsibilities:
- Responsible for maintaining the website content of Radio Netherlands Indonesian news section.
- Developed and implemented multi channel marketing and promotion strategies to promote the website.
- Thesis project with the title: Marketing Strategy Development for a Not-for-Profit Organization’s Website, Increasing Public Awareness and Effectiveness of Radio Nederland Worldwide, Indonesian Section Website.
profile_positions.title: Website Content Manager

profile_positions.description:
Summary of responsibilities:
- Planed and managed various marketing and communications events (i.e. exhibitions, campaigns, and product launch).
- Worked with vendors and partners to organise the exhibitions.
- Responsible for designing merchandises and communication tools (i.e. rolling banners, brochures, leaflet) for various campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Marketing and Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Summary of responsibilities:
• Assisted and monitored a one-off campaign project from Dancow, a product of Nestle, across various media (both ATL and BTL).
• Evaluated and analyzed the efficiency and effectiveness of this one-off campaign.
• Responsible for analyzing market trends, direct competitors’ advertising and marketing strategies to create a new strategy plan for Dancow and Vicks.
• Conducted several customer-based researches using focus group discussion (FGD).
• Analyzed the result of FGD and suggested the result to strategic planner for future marketing strategies.
• Assisted the creative team in the production of various advertisings for Pro XL, Dancow, and Nesvita from casting until photo session.
• Supervised designers and ensured that marketing communications messages were effectively and consistently conveyed across multiple communication media (e.g. brochures, posters, banners, ads).
profile_positions.title: Junior Account Executive
